sentences: Born December 15, 1996, Booth was raised in Campton, Kentucky Wolfe County, Kentucky, which is in the Southeastern part of the state.
Tyler signed a major record deal with Sony Music Nashville in early 2020.

By 2017, Booth's songwriting and singing was gaining attention, including from songwriter and producer Phil O'Donnell who invited Booth down to Nashville, where he had Booth sing on a number of songs he had written, while also composing additional material.

Booth was featured on Brooks & Dunn's Reboot (Brooks & Dunn album) album from 2019, joining them on their hit Lost And Found, and his touring commitments have intensified, including runs with Dwight Yoakam and Brantley Gilbert on his 'Kick It In The Ship Cruise':Later in 2019, Booth released the single Long Comes A Girl, along with Where the Livin' Is, through Villa40/Sony Music Nashville.
